title: 転んで、返って、待ちかねて

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huff, hah, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
One more...!!
Taaaaaaaah――!

As declared, to make the 'Japan Cup' a special day, she trained hard...
Her condition was nearing perfection!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-wow!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Look, Trainer! When I posted on SNS, 'I'll do my best in tomorrow's Japan Cup!'――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Comments like 'Do your best!' came pouring in, one after another!

text_block_list.name: Comment
text_block_list.text: 'I get courage from the always positive Matikanetannhauser! Do your best!'

text_block_list.name: Comment
text_block_list.text:
'I'll go to the racecourse to cheer you on tomorrow!
Please run with all your might!'
In the comment section, many comments arrived, filled with hot expectations for her.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ahh,
everyone's looking forward to it, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Whoooa～～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll go run just one more lap!

And then, finally, the day of the 'Japan Cup' arrived.
For some reason,
Matikanetannhauser didn't show up for quite a while.

Did she get the racecourse wrong again?
As I was thinking that――

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
'Hello, Tannhauser's Trainer?
...I want you to listen calmly, but'

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
'Tannhauser...
collapsed with a nosebleed――'

Currently, she's undergoing tests at the hospital.
Hearing that it's not serious, but she likely won't be able to run in today's race――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
'The power of a 'protagonist' who moves someone's heart!
I want to create that for someone again!'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: "I want to become the 'protagonist'...!"
Her entry in the 'Japan Cup' was abruptly canceled. She hurried to the hospital.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh man, I did it again! Seriously, I always mess up at the crucial moment!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe I got too fired up today, huh? I crashed, went down with a thud, and just...
Large tears drip, plop plop, from Matikanetannhauser's eyes.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wh-what the heck, seriously, why is this happening, what am I even doing...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I-I just, I can't believe in myself anymore...!
(Knock knock)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Whoa, you're crying.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, Nature!? Weren't you supposed to be at your part-time job today!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I can't focus on a part-time job when you're this down in the dumps!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...I knew you were working hard for today, after all.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ugh~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I was really in top form, the best I've ever been, but, but, at the most important moment...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe I'm no good. Maybe I can't become the 'protagonist'...!
Matikanetannhauser hangs her head. Nice Nature looks at her with a determined expression—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I have to look forward and push through. Moping around won't help anything.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: This is something Tannhauser taught me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It's true, you might have betrayed the hype that was building up today.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You might have moved further away from being the 'main character'.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But you have to look forward.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...That's what I think now. What about you?
And then, right at that moment—

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hey! Machitan's crying! Don't cry, Turbo's here!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: No loud voices in the hospital, Turbo-san.
This time, Twin Turbo and Ikuno Dictus arrived.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: E-e-everyone!?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: We have something we want to show Tannhauser-san. Here it is.
On Ikuno Dictus's smartphone, the Umatter timeline was displayed—
'It's okay, next time there must be the long-awaited victory!'
'You'll definitely get first place in the next race! I'll go watch again, so do your best!'
A flood of encouraging comments had arrived for Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: These are comments that came in after hearing about the withdrawal.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It's true, this time Tannhauser-san was a highly anticipated Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It wouldn't be an exaggeration to say you were the most anticipated in your racing career.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
But... there's always next time.
If you couldn't win today, just win next time—that's all there is to it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Just win next time...
That was a phrase I was very familiar with.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yeah!
That's what you've been saying all along, isn't it!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Machitan!
Let's definitely win the next race!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
We'll win next time and show them!
That Machitan is amazing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Turbo...
...Everyone...
Matikanetannhauser looked up at the friends who had rushed over—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Yeah.
...Yeah!
She roughly wiped away her tears.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I'll do it!
I won't give up, I'll give it a try...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely win next time, for sure!
After a few days of recuperation, Matikanetannhauser safely returned to the academy. And then—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm ready!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Let's make the next race to enter the 'Arima Kinen'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I know, the next 'Arima Kinen' is a highly anticipated race with many strong rivals gathered!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hayahide-san, the Umamusume in peak form right now, is entering, and it's also Teio-san's comeback race—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Palmer-san, Ticket-san,
Nature, Rice-san...
An impressive lineup of members are entering!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Plus, I just collapsed, so I'm completely behind! But!
If you want to win, you have to win. That's what she taught me over these three years.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I want to win the 'Arima Kinen'. This time, absolutely, absolutely—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I want to win and become my own kind of 'protagonist'!
Next is the 'Arima Kinen'. All that's left is to run and deliver the long-awaited victory.
